product.description:
The classic button-down gets a modern update with these trendy Favorite Tunic from Merona· This stylish long-sleeve shirt boasts classic design details like a pointed collar, shirttail hem, back yoke and cuffed sleeves· Modern updates include half-length front buttons and a high-low hem that's extra-long in the back·
  • Sizing: Women Relaxed Fit
  • Weave Type: Herringbone
product.name: Merona® Women's Tunic - MeronaTM
